mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter (fragment), Christie Johnson to Mary Morris Hamilton, 1858 August 4
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, Christie
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Incomplete letter from Christie Johnson, secretary, to Mary Morris Hamilton, Vice Regent for New York, August 4, 1858. Marked confidential. In regards to a misunderstanding in Mr. Thornburn's appointment, and a survey of Mount Vernon by J.A. Washington and adjustment of boundary lines. Mrs. Ritchie and Regent consider Mr. Thornburn for Superintendent of Mount Vernon.
